General.Name: Converge Technology Solutions Corp
General.Description: Converge Technology Solutions Corp. provides software-enabled IT and cloud solutions in the United States and Canada. Its solutions approach delivers advanced analytics, application modernization, cloud, cybersecurity, digital infrastructure, and digital workplace offerings to clients across various industries. The company also offers managed and talent services, and hardware and software products and solutions. Converge Technology Solutions Corp. was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Gatineau, Canada.
General.Address: 85 rue Victoria, Gatineau, QC, Canada, J8X 2A3

8.Name: Mr. Tommy  Whatley
8.Title: Exec. VP of Services & Vendor Alliances
